stories.text:
I want to quit social media, I waste so much time scrolling and scrolling forever. Whenever I delete my accounts, one month later I end coming back to it and I get stuck in this unhealthy loop.

Effective tips are appreciated!
stories.title: Ask HN: How to Quit Social Media?
Ask HN: Hi, would someone be able to invite me to lobste.rs?

stories.text:
Hi everyone, Some context: I have 6 years of experience as a DevSecOps engineer. My work involves code review, security testing, integration of security tools into CI/CD pipelines and development of internal security services / tools for Developers and DevOps teams.

After a self-reflection on the different things that I have done, I found myself enjoying building things and promoting good security practices.

I wonder if there any good tips on how to transition from security to software development? How should I position myself when applying for software engineering jobs?

I know one of my weaknesses is the lack of knowledge in Data Structures and Algorithms. And I will need to re-study the DSA topics again and practicing leetcode. Another weakness is the lack of understanding about software performance.

Thanks for reading this.
stories.title: Ask HN: Skills to leverage on when moving from security to software engr?
